mapper.select: SELECT ca.address FROM alq_consultation_attachment AS ca WHERE ca.consultation_id=#{id}
SELECT ca.address as video FROM alq_consultation_attachment AS ca WHERE ca.consultation_id=#{id} and ca.type=3
SELECT ca.address FROM alq_consultation_attachment AS ca WHERE ca.consultation_id=#{id} AND ca.consultation_attachment_id IS NULL

SELECT ca.address, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(ca.address,1,4)='http' THEN ca.address ELSE CONCAT ("http://yst-images.img-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/",ca.address) END addressDetil, ca.attachment_id, CASE WHEN ca.type is null THEN 2 ELSE ca.type END type, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(attm.size_info,',',1) FROM alq_attachment attm WHERE attm.id=ca.attachment_id)width, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(attm.size_info,',',-1) FROM alq_attachment attm WHERE attm.id=ca.attachment_id) height
FROM alq_consultation_attachment AS ca WHERE ca.consultation_id = #{id} AND ca.cover = 1

SELECT ca.address, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(ca.address,1,4)='http' THEN ca.address ELSE CONCAT ("http://yst-images.img-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/",ca.address) END addressDetil, ca.type,ca.detail_content content,ca.sort_num sortNum,ca.attachment_id , (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(attm.size_info,',',1) FROM alq_attachment attm WHERE attm.id=ca.attachment_id)width, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(attm.size_info,',',-1) FROM alq_attachment attm WHERE attm.id=ca.attachment_id) height FROM alq_consultation_attachment AS ca WHERE IFNULL(ca.cover,0) != 1 AND ca.consultation_id = #{id} ORDER BY ca.sort_num ASC

SELECT c.id,c.type,c.title, ca.address, CASE WHEN SUBSTRING(ca.address,1,4)='http' THEN ca.address ELSE CONCAT ("http://yst-images.img-cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/",ca.address) END addressDetil,c.status,ca.attachment_id,c.detail_summary descr,c.consulatation_id pid, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(attm.size_info,',',1) FROM alq_attachment attm WHERE attm.id=ca.attachment_id)width, (SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(attm.size_info,',',-1) FROM alq_attachment attm WHERE attm.id=ca.attachment_id) height FROM alq_consultation_attachment ca ,alq_consultation c WHERE ca.consultation_id = c.id AND c.is_delete=0 AND ca.cover =1 and c.id = #{id} and c.type = #{type}
SELECT c.detail_content AS detailContent FROM alq_consultation_attachment AS c WHERE c.consultation_id=#{id} AND c.type=0 ORDER BY c.created_time ASC LIMIT 1
